column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hello Eric - Thank you for your review. I'm sorry you did not enjoy our fare. We don't often receive feedback that our food is bland. Can you tell me what item(s) you ordered? Please know that if you're ever dissatisfied with our food in any way
column2: we will do everything in our power to make things right
column3: either by remaking the item or offering an alternative. The same goes for any beverage you might order
column4: as well. I hope to hear from you.
